comments:
Build:  TPTP-4.2.0-200605250100

Follow the steps exactly as outlined below:
Make sure that large log support is enabled with *embedded cloudscape*.

a) Select the link to viewer toolbar button in the profiling monitor view
b) Select File > Import > Log File
c) Add the apache access log file and the apache error log files attached
d) Once the log files finish importing switch  back and forth between the two logs by single clicking them.

I got the following error for one of the log files imported (it's sometimes apache access, apache error, or both that cause this error):
